title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIII, pt. 350 - Continuing Care Retirement Communities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIII, pt. 350 - Continuing Care Retirement Communities

State Regulations
§ 350.0 - Approval of the superintendent
§ 350.1 - Definitions
§ 350.2 - Reserves
§ 350.3 - Reserve liability calculation
§ 350.4 - General rules regarding reserve liability calculation
§ 350.5 - Adjustments to reserves
§ 350.6 - Assets supporting reserve liabilities
§ 350.7 - Surplus
§ 350.8 - Test for solvency
§ 350.9 - Actuarial study
§ 350.10 - Fee schedule submission
§ 350.11 - Transactions between a continuing care retirement community and its parent corporation, affiliates and subsidiaries
§ 350.12 - Financial reports and information requests

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIII, pt. 350

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1119; Public Health Law, §§4604(4)(a), 4607, 4611

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
